metadata.synopsis: One-liner mother, part of a family trio.Player has entered their family home unbidden (family may otherwise turn up dead - killed by a mind flayer the player failed to stop earlier. Here this is not the case, and the potential victim is oblivious to what might have happened).
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to S_LOW_WindmillMindflayerFollowup_Mother - 323eb737-2422-4026-b403-785473c738ee - (22 43 1)

0.speaker: Talli Armbrust
0.text: Are you a friend of my husband, perhaps?

1.speaker: Talli Armbrust
1.text: Hello? I, um, wasn't expecting any guests...
